content.detailedDescription: Everyday i go home driving from my office and taking 41nw street going east to get into the palmetto highway,that night as soon i did cross 97ave i noticed a strong circular light in the horizon in front of me and above the city lights and trafic lights, the sphere was positioned north of the miami airport and steady ,i keep driving and the sphere was moving very slow south crossing over the airport, at that moment i realized that cannot be a plane if that is moving north to south and the planes land in miami either form west to east or east to west, i took my cellular phone and start recording while driving, when i did crossed 87 ave and them 84th avenue i saw that the sphere had move south of the aiport at about 3 to 5 miles and the sphere was big and super bright,it was emitting a very constant bright flashing lights, i keep recording until i was under the hightway bridge and took the entrance to the highway and i could record anymore since i was taking a 350 degree curb, at that ramp going up i keep seeing the sphere until i was facing north and i lost the sight of it.I was sure that the big sphere was not a plane and the only think that coulb be a big helipcoter, but there was not any metallic forms and i never saw a helicopter produce such of intense flashing lights and how a helicopter will be traveling from north to south over the airport interfering with the air traficc, saw that nigh i look at the local news and i did not hear any  reports of an strange object.
content.summary: On june 14th i left my office going home and i saw a huge sphere of flashing lights standing on the clear sky.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving down the nj turnpike and we were between exits 9 and 10. it was exactly 10 pm at night because i checked. my mom,who was driving, told me to look ahead at the bright "moon". turns out it wasn't a moon but a very weird object in the sky. at first we thought it was a blimp that was flying but after we kept looking, it looked very weird. to both of us it seemed as if it were triangular or pyramid like in appearance. also of importance was a blinking red light it had on the bottom. it would blink every 6 seconds or around. also, it looked as if the craft was still but it was moving slowly to the right. after about 2 minutes, we lost sight of it because it the trees blocked it out. 30 seconds into it, we saw it again by the raritan river. it looked even further away and this was with  turnpike being a straight away through all this. i took a video while this was happening. also, it seemed as if it was turning and going away from the turnpike because the red, blinking lights were turning until it wasn't visible. we eventually passed it and we couldn't see it anymore. my mom and i have never seen anything like that so that's why i waited till today to report it. if you guys could message us back with what you think we would greatly appreciate it. thank you, hope this helps your orangization 


p.S- i was searching the internet and another ufo was spotted in south kearny, new jersey. they look pretty similar i would say. you might want to check it out [link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: We were driving through nj turnpike when we witnessed this very bright and unusual object.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving a friend of mine's home june, 12th 2011 and i turned right onto sh 99 from mason rd. in pecan grove.  literally right as i turned on the highway i watched what i thought to be an airplane flying in a southerly direction (due to the road traveling east/west in the area) but i then noticed more lights than a conventional aircraft that remained on, no strobing or anything.   i then could make out the shape and noticed it was a v-shaped craft almost identical to one i had seen before during hurricane ike.  i watched as it traveled slowly towards and eventually stop entirely to hover over cellular towers that lay directly east of my location (or right in front of me as i traveled down that particular part of sh 99.)  it sat there for not even a minute when at the very nose of the craft a red light the same color as the cell towers flashed twice in almost a pulsing manner (like the cell towers themselves do).  upon the second 'pulse' all the lights on the craft began to dim dramatically until the only light visible was the red one at the nose which then remained illuminated and disappeared last.   the whole sequence of events played out rather quickly or i would of attempted to take a photograph with my phone.  i remember thinking it was an ordinary airplane during much of the experience like my thoughts on my hurricane sighting until i watched how it could stop and hover, then the adrenaline got going.   i continued to watch to catch it again after it had gone to no avail.  it was a clear night and it wasn't until i had gotten home and was telling my brother about the ordeal that i realized how truly strange the experience was.  i also found it quite interesting that i've seen an object almost exactly like it before over houston's skies.  nasa has got to be experimenting with some sort of craft, that or lackland/brooks are testing said craft in this area of texas.  it might also explain the over abundance of black hawk, chinook, and apache helicopters that have been flying over houston as of late.
content.summary: Evenly spaced white lights on v shaped craft hovering over cell towers

content.detailedDescription: I was driving up balboa blvd near parthenia st as me and my step son saw what he described as a white shiny missile as it had no wings and was cylindrical in shape after watching it for a few seconds it completely disappeared from sight out of nowhere!
content.summary: Cylindrical ufo sighted in north hills,ca

content.detailedDescription: Monitoring traffic cams and saw these; possibly artifacts/lens flares?
content.summary: Traffic cams

content.detailedDescription:
1. on the corner of division st. and s 7th st, i was with my friend at a playground with minimal street lights for being inside the city.

2. coincidentally, i brought my video camera on a thought of seeing a ufo.  i looked up in the north west sky at the stars and see the two lights.

3+4. i did not know what to make of it.  the two lights pulsed red,blue,red,blue, and rotated simultaneously in the form of a circle and also were getting closer and closer to each other.  i yell, and suddenly the two lights glide away from each other horizontally and very swiftly.  my friend looks up just after the right light vanishes and the left light 0freezes in place and blends with the stars around it.  30 seconds pass and the frozen lights begins gliding slowly toward the west. we follow but ends up blending in with the sky.

5. i had a video camera but it did not capture any stars.  strangely, the reason for bringing the camera was to look for ufo's and see just how common they were. that night changed my life because now i believe 100%

6. the pulsing star moved slowly and ended up blending into another star. i can't remember exactly how we llost it, because we followed it for at least 20 minutes and it just blended into the night sky.
content.summary: Two pulsing dots in the sky rotating, then stopping, then moving to the west.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home after band practice recently and looked up to notice 2 green lights waving around in the sky very briefly, as if it were searching for something or emitting some sort of "laser therapy" to the atmosphere. i've never seen anything like it. i'm not sure if the other craft had its own green light or if it was only the reflection from the first craft, but as soon as i had depicted 2 crafts one had quickly disappeared. then the craft in my primary focus seemed to change its lighting from the green spot lights to a variation of light pattern blinks of green and red as soon as it had distinctively changed its path, which really shocked me seeing as how it was definitely not an airplane. it would've had to have been making impossible maneuvers and changing its light scheme around, and the disappearence of these crafts happened in an instant. the main craft seemed to hover about for about a minute then completely changed its direction and disappeared into thin air. i literally had to pull over to watch this for about a minute or so. it was single handedly one of the most unexplainable events i've ever experienced to this day.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 ufo's using green spot light and changing direction

content.detailedDescription: As my husband and i traveled in separate vehicles we observed a massive rectangular object about the size of two football fields end to end travel over us and glide silently at about 150ft off the ground, bank left and then continue up and over the distant hills.. we observed a red glowing spear on one side that was from one end of the object to the other and could see the glow from the other side that also appeared to be red. there was no sound emitted from the object and we observed several massive spotlights on the front of the object. it was traveling so low that if we had a rock we could have hit it. there were several other vehicles on the road and we are curious whether others have reported this sighting as it lasted for an extended period of time. i found the sighting both terrifying and somewhat exciting. we were driving from l.A. to florida and even ten years later discuss this brief encounter on a regular basis. can't stop thinking about it...
content.summary: Driving in separate vehicles, my husband and i observed a massive rectangular object with glowing red spears that extended the length of the object on both sides travel over us at 150ft off the ground, bank left and move on over the hills

content.detailedDescription: I live on the space coast of fla, 'n i have seen a lot of strange objects in the sky, usually at night. one afternoon i was sitting in my back yard, taking pics of my tropical plants, when i heard a buzzing/humming sound to the north. the sky was overcast, i looked up in the direction and saw a kind of a barrel shape floating. i took some pics w' my digital cam but they didn't seem to register. i also had a 110mm cam which i also shot a pic to the north. i followed the sound toward the east 'n snapped a pic as it went behind some trees. it then was heading south 'n came out into the clearing 'n i snapped another pic. it then kinda leaned forward 'n took off really fast heading west. when i came into my house i tried to download my digital cam but it was blank except for the flower pics. my 110mm had a 24 film roll 'n at this time there were 10 snaps. i used the cam over 5 yrs 'n when the roll was used up, i had it developed. i had thought maybe the pics didn't come out like the digital. i was surprised when they looked so clear. as i was watching this thing, i suddenly knew how they move, how they beat gravity. the pics i enclosed were scaned, i have original films.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Humming/buzzing sound

content.detailedDescription: I was just leaving mc'donalds after the liquor store closed so it was just after 10pm. i was driving my car down a dark stretch of suburban neigbhorhood road.  i saw a kid in the opposite lane, walking funny, looking up at the sky with his cell phone glowing in his face the darkness. i thought that was weird, so i looked behind me up into the sky, and i almost (deleted) my pants.  way up in the sky there were two bright orange things almost swirling, but just kind of floating and carving around.  i was driving about 30mph and headed toward a stop sign.  i slowed my car down and actually came to a stop, a foot into the opposite lane.  i just sat there in my stopped vehicle looking up at the sky saying holy (deleted) holy (deleted) i then whipped my car over to the side of the road, parked that thing and started running full speed back down the road.  the "fireballs" were now much further away and looked very distant.  my view was blocked by trees so i had to keep running.  i got to the opening and the were gone. i stood there for a about 15 seconds and then from behind me! i saw two more "fireballs" float right over my head! they gained speed and flew up and kind of danced and then procedded to just fade and dissepear.  i had run about 100 yards now and i saw the kid on the other side of the road right by mcdonalds, still with his cell phone recording.  i yelled "do you know what the hell those things were!" and he replied "no!" so i ran over and we were both just flabergasted and tripping out.  i actually noticed a plane with bright lights approaching and i was so excited i couldn't believe there were cars just driving around oblivious to what just happened.  i watched the video on the kids cell phone and we exchanged phone #s and i went on my way back to my car.  as i was walking back to my car i noticed that the large plane/jet had actually done two circles over the spot just overhead! i called the kid and told him about the plane. and said i'd call him tomorrow.  now i've got the videos to share.
content.summary: Bright orange orbs float and dance in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was heading from east greenville to emmaus on northbound route 29 at about 9:00 pm. it was suprisingly light out (dusk), i guess because the days are so long right now. there were wispy clouds in the sky. i noticed an odd red light low in the sky to my left, through the windshield, as i approached shimerville. i believe this would have made it north-west of shimerville, definitely west of rt 29. i assumed it was an airplane, but i thought it was odd that i only saw a red light, no other color, and it wasn't blinking, it was shimmering. it almost looked like a stoplight hanging way up in the sky. it wasn't a clear well-defined light due to the clouds, which may have accounted for the shimmering. it looked stationary, but since i was moving it was hard to conclude whether the object was also moving or not. i still assumed it was an aircraft of some sort and that our movement relative to each other was what was making it seem like it was hovering. but after a while that seemed unlikely because enough time had passed that it should have displayed more movement than it did, in fact if it was moving at all it was certainly too slow to remain aloft. i started to wonder if it could be some celestial body that was particulary large right now, but there were no other objects visible whatsoever, and it would have been much, much larger than any object i've ever seen in the night sky except the moon, and it was glowing bright red. after a minute or two, it was overhead or behind me so i couldn't see it through the windshield anymore. i couldn't look back because there was a car close behind me, so i made a left into a parking lot, turned, and stopped facing south, where i could see it again. by now, it appeared to be east of route 29. i can't tell if it had actually moved east or if my few minutes of driving had just taken me to the west of it. i watched it for a few minutes, it seemed like it might have gotten slightly dimmer during that time. it may have been rising, and if it was moving at all i'd say it was heading southeast. if you pressed me for an everyday explanation, i'd say it might have been a road flare tied to a balloon or something. whatever it was, it was very odd. when i gave up and turned north again, it was 9:17pm. i just wanted to be on the record in case anyone else reported it too.
content.summary: Red light hovering motionless over shimerville

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i witnessed a flashing object steak by creating a glowing orange trail in a flash. this was level below the clouds and i am an amateur astronomer. this was not a meteor. it flew in a straight line towards the south east coast of ny (long island bound) at an extremely high rate of speed (beyond anything imaginable).
i had no time to take pictures. the speed alone was phenomenal.
content.summary: Glowing object streaked by below clouds extremely high rate of speed ufo

content.detailedDescription:
6/17/11 - 1:31pm - i work in south kearny, nj and at about 1:30pm i went out on the porh at work to see the on coming thunder storm.. i was talking to a co-worker when  big flash of lightening struck..  we were watching the sky for more lightening and seconds later, i said to my co-worker, "what's that"??  first he said it was a bird, then said it was a black plastic bag then said, "i don't know".. i told him to keep it in sight and i'll go get my camera..
i have a 10x zoom on my camera and managed to get 3 pictures as it traveled from south to north in a pretty direct path over my job in south kearny, nj before losing sight of it over our building at work...
all i know is that it was unidentified and it was flying...
content.summary: "unidentified" flying object

content.detailedDescription: As seen from north phoenix at about 11:25 pm on june 16, 2011.  i was sitting out back watching the sky for satellites and shooting stars.  i routinely sky watch before going to sleep because it helps me clear my mind.  i was facing north.  i was looking in the direction of cygnus. i had seen two fairly bright satellites traveling from the north to the south over the last half an hour that i was stargazing. i had finished my last cigarette and was taking a couple more moments to take a final look for anything in the sky.  below the constellation cygnus but not as low as lacerta, i saw movement. at first i thought it was a dim satellite but after about 1 second it looked more like a dim shooting star with a short trail. i almost always have my 8x binoculars with me. so, i looked at the object with the binoculars and was shocked to see it was clearly three dimly lit orangish lights. the lights looked slightly out of focus, as my binoculars were focused for seeing the stars. i re-focused and while shifting the focus, the lights looked as if there was a haze or solid craft around the lights. there was darker area surrounding the three round lights.  with all three lights in a horizontal position they looked to be on an elongated oval.  when i first viewed the object with my binoculars the lights looked larger than the bright star in lyra and were of a dim or translucent luminosity.  all three lights were first seen horizontal and spaced evenly apart and very close together. i perceived the three lights to be part of one object.  i am familiar with what planes of different sizes look like from many different angles.  i have seen meteors of many sorts as well as large birds at night and balloons of many types.  this object had no faa required lighting at all and was traveling faster than any planes i have seen above my city. it was not traveling at such a great speed as to be shocking but definitely faster than an average jet. as the object headed nne from it's point of first sighting it seemed to shift so that the lights were now vertically aligned. when it appeared vertically in the sky the lights had more of a brighter white quality than they had when they were in a horizontal position. as the object traveled further towards the horizon it shifted back to a more horizontal position and the lights were again more of a dim orange glow. i lost sight of the object at about 10 degrees above the horizon due to light pollution. this object looked very large in comparing it with my experience of viewing many planes with my binoculars. there were no viable airplanes that i could see but i could hear one south of me. the object that i saw did not seem to make any sound.
content.summary: Three dim orange lights in a line.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the sky about 4 am since i have seen many lights move across the sky i wanted to observe more. standing in front of my house i was looking in the sw direction when i saw a ball of light moving across the sky at a high rate of speed i immediately moved to see where it was going since it was moving so fast ne as it moved across the sky it seemed to stop move in reverse the move forward again leaving a stream of white light and then disappearing immediately after about 30 seconds an airplane comes into view  followed by two more they were in a triangular formation moving e to w the airplanes did not make ant noticeable engine noise
content.summary: Ball of ligt traviling nw to se

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back garden having a cigarette and i looked at one star and imediately noticed a very bright white orb/sphere coming directly over my garden and then slowly go all the way into the distance, it was very low, maximum 1000 feet i would say and was completey silent and very bright and very clear to see, i have a strong set of binoculars and viewed it through them and could only make out a white sphere moving at a steady rate of speed, nothing else, it looked unbelievable, i just dont know what the hell it was, but id love to know, this was one of a few incredible sightings i have had but this was the closest and most clear. i just cant believe what i saw the other night... (name deleted moved evidence location)fg
content.summary: Very bright white orb/sphere flew over me, 500-1000 feet up

content.detailedDescription: It was 10:16pm and my step father and myself were sky watching as i notice a star-like object dirrectly above us traveling at a intense rate from south to north bound, the object was too faint to video tape but we were able to watch it through the binoculars. it didn't make noise and was high up to make any clear identification of it's surface. we watch it until it was too far away to see it.
content.summary: Single light in the sky traveling south to north at a high rate

content.detailedDescription:
in the early 1970s a friend and myself were walking home, we lived somewhat in the country, between developing oklahoma city and moore, the airport is fairly close and it was common to see or hear airplanes as they approached the airport. that evening i noticed a tall dark object fairly close to us (appx 500ft. away) hovering in the air, was not able to make out much detail from this angle, but it appeared to be as tall as it was wide.
   my friend and i debated and he thought it was just an aircraft etc. but several minutes go by and it apparent this is too stationary, and there is no noise, albit the humming sound comming from the telephone line which was very near us.As we debated on what this was , slowly the craft began a very slow 90 degree turn, as it did so quickly it became apparent what it was, as soon as it began turning we noticed lights also, most striking was a very large triangular light in the dead center with a brilliant white light, it also had a series of colored lights on a lower rung of the craft, we could see it was about 500 ft away and very low flying no more than a hundred feet or so,.
   at this time i became noticably nervous. and had concerns as to what their intentions were, this is the era where cattle mutilations and abducties and experiments were common. my friend, however was ready to approach them and meet them, at this time i  was lit up like a lightbulb with a very brilliant white light, it had no noticable heat, i looked at my friend and we were both shinning white, it was at this time i noticed that we were not casting any shaddow from the light, which struck me as peculiar, with the vehicle in front of us and at the angle the light should have cast a shadow of our bodies, it did not the light completely surrounded us, at the time i assumed, or thought the light was imminating from the large triangular light (which had very soft, rounded corners and was appx. 20-30 feet around) , but i do not remember seeing the light come from the triangular one. 
   i was very apprehensive and its like my life passed before me and i did not feel good about the encounter, even though my friend did, and i took only about 2-3 steps back, and slowly convinced my friend to do the same, all this time the craft was still decending slowly directly towards us, my friend finally took a step or 2 back, the light was still shinning on us, remarkably, as if to read our minds the craft stopped when we backed off, several more minutes passed and it just hovered in front of us, shortly there after it made several very quick and non-uniform ascents upward, traveling at an unbeleivable speed, the pattern of flight showed no planning etc, just zig-zaged and finally away.
   through the years i have wandered if the events i remember are all that happened, and to the best i can remember this was the extent of this encounter, i did feel a sense of ease in the fact that when we showed conscious thoughts of apprehention, the craft stopped, this was more than enough evidence to convince me that there was intelligent life guiding it and making decisions, and i admit i felt some respect at the time for not being carried away without my will. 
    i have shared this story a few times over the years and as most people shrug it off and do not beleive it, however there is no doubt what the 2 of us saw was very real. years ago i looked at a pamplet which identified all of the ufos seen by people across the world, and sure enough one of the depicitions is indeed very close to what i saw that night, so that at least has given me some comfort.
content.summary: Witness a large object low flying turn around and shinning a white light.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i decided to have a cigaret break around 330 am and as we were standing out side i looked up and saw a bright light just over the tree tops at first it did not appear to be moving but as we watched it became apperant it was rising higher as well as comming in our direction no blinkingg lights no pulsing just looked like a planet or large star till we realized it was moving then in the opposit direction another light appeared with blinking lights like a plane but unmoving we took four pictures on the cell phone but they are too grainy to see detail and get a perspective of size but the object was about four times the size of the surounding stars that were barely visible due to fog. earlier that day around 830 pm i saw two other shining objects while standing outside of work having a cigaret breakin that incident it first seemed to be one object which in a matter of seconds became two identical objects near each other. i am always watching the sky so it was not unusual for me to have looked up but this morning there was no missing it the light was very bright and the first thing i did was say to my son look a ufo at first he said it was probably a planet as it was too big to be a star but when we became certain it moved he told me to go in and get the phone to take the picture i was hesitant to leave him out there alone i did not loose sight of it in fact i am going back out to see if it is still there right now perhaps get a better picture i just wanted to know if any one else saw this light in waukesha wisconsin this morning
content.summary: There was what first appeared to be either a large star or planet just above the tree line it was too foggy to have been that bright of a star yet we could see it perfectly at around 3-330  we took pictures with cell phone but grainy

content.detailedDescription: Took picture of airplane over downtown san diego and noticed 2 disks in photo.  may or may not be a reflection but was interesting.
content.summary: Two disk flying next to plane

content.detailedDescription: I was going to a small store during dusk at waynesboro pa(located near the maryland border). it must have been in the late 1990's or early 2000's. i got out of the car.  i looked up and saw either 4 or maybe 5 glowing balls of light in a line formation. they were silent, and looked like they were not moving.  they were actually more of an oval shape, but the actual objects were glowing white. they were very high up.  i do not know if anyone else saw them.  i went inside for about 5 minutes and when i came out they were gone.  it was very weird.  i have heard of other people seeing strange objects near waynesboro.  we are located near a top secret facility that is located inside a mountain.  it is known as site r, and it is in the next county over. i do not want to disclose any information about site r as it is an extremely sesitive place. also,we are located near site c(maryland), camp david(maryland), and fort ritchie md.(no longer an active base). thank you.
content.summary: It was either 4 or 5 small glowing balls/discs in formation not moving, and no sound.  very high up.  then they disapeard after few minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I saw two young people looking up as i turned east on porter st. off of south bound berwyn st. i looked up and saw a very,very red light with small white lights on the outside. it floated from north to south and then went to the east and up and out of sight. it was not an airplane.I was suprised to actually see a ufo.The object was very bright red.
content.summary: Red ball with white lights around out side floated noiselessly  from  north to south at low altitude then went east and up and disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: Out at night sledding with younger brother and neighbor in eddington,me.,we obseved dark disc slowly flying over us,as we all almost spotted it immediately it stopped dead in the air turned 90 " sped quickly to short distance stopped then turned again 90" back parallel to original course and flew over horizon at incredibal speed a short time later i see something fly across whole sky on same flight path ,this also flew incredibly fast.We notified local paper,but was only ridiculed in article to make it sound like we had seen airplane with blinking green and red lights.This was not an airplane and i have since known that whomever first called them flying saucers saw what we had seen and they are believed by me.
content.summary: Slow moving disc changed speed and direction twice on being observed

content.detailedDescription: it came down the  valley of the river (momongahela river)visible in line .  could see very well.  could not of been the only person to see  it that night     wonder why  no one has said  anything  .    never seen anything on ufo's or unexplained objects on this.  i know what i saw   my husband says tell someone. so i lived at southwestern pa  in octber      (1980)  (name deleted)fg                                                                  it was  egg sphere lookinging  object surrounmded by a cylinder sphere bright uluminous all over  very visible
content.summary: Cylinder with a shere looking top bright ulumianted all over

content.detailedDescription:
Star-like light but brighter, traveling from east to west then stopping, and then while going from west to east it slowly got brighter by about 10 times brighter then looking at a commercial jet's headlight for about 3 to 4 seconds, an then the light slowly went back to it's original brightness, the whole thing lasted about 20 seconds.
i was out on my deck looking at the stars and the moon, and i was trying to take a picture of the moon, when i noticed the star-like light,(it was a clear night). my first impression of it going east to west was a satellite but when it faded and started coming back, west to east and did the crazy light demonstration,(that i have heard about) i knew it was the real thing, (a ufo).!!!
content.summary: Star-like light but brighter, traveling east to west then stopping, and then going west to east, for about 20 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at cordell hull lake fishing.  i noticed a yellow-orange glow coming from a wooded hilltop on the other side of the lake.  at first, i thought it was headlights, but then as i was watching, i realized it was the wrong color for headlights.  it was a slow pulsing from dim to bright, then back to dim.  it wasn't behaving like a fire or any light source that i know of.  i watched it for about an hour.  i was very curious, but i wasn't sure how to get over there to see it more closely. it was still going on when i left.
content.summary: Yellow orange glow coming from hill.  was not a fire.

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 10pm central time on 6/16/2011.
i was outside, happen to be looking up.
i could see commercial aircraft in the sky moving at their usual speed and altitude.  i have seen satellites before.  i have seen meteors of different sizes, speed, and color before.  but i could not explain this.

coming from slightly south east, 2 objects moving in tandem, one slightly in front of the other but moving at the same speed, curved slightly and headed due west, passing over the house and out of view.
they were moving faster than the commercial aircraft currently in the sky.
there was also no sound either before, during, or after they had passed.
i am not sure what it was except unidentifiable.  i have chosen to submit this brief sighting on this site in the hopes that others either east or west of me submit more information in the attempt to identify these objects.
content.summary: 2 star-like objects moving fast from east to west in tandem

content.detailedDescription: We were star gazing when a large (larger than a normal plane) sphere orange pink in color trailed a plane across the horizon.  it was traveling from west to northeast and was behind the plane and lower.  we watched it until they were both out of sight.  we witnessed this through binoculars. previously about two nights ago we witnessed a large blue white glowing object more oblong in shape crossing the sky at low altitude from the west to east.  this object was so low it was close to the treetops.  we have seen many unknown objects over the past few weeks that have unusual flight paths and are not a plane or helicopter.  this has never happened before.  we are experienced sky watchters and this is the first time this has occurred.
content.summary: Orange pink sphere low on the horizon trailed a plane across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
There sre what appear to be crop circles in the wheat fields on both sides of jarrettsville pike, close to the intersection of blenheim rd., north of loch raven watershed.

need a pilot with a camera!

i left a message with the office manager at fallston airport, hoping to interest someone with a plane.
content.summary: Crop circles

content.detailedDescription:
I reported something similar not too long ago. this time though the light did not get brighter then go back tyo normal size....It remained the same size and seemed much lower.
 i was smoking outside this morning and was watching the stars when i caught sight of a meteor enter our atmosphere, burst into flames and disappear behind a tree line. this was the longest burning meteor i have ever seen and i wouldn't be surprised if this one hit the ground in peices because it was so long and just looked like it would of had to reach the ground. anyway, after being amazed by this cool meteor, i looked back over towards the "big dipper" and noticed an extra star in the handle. but it was moving across the sky and was much brighter and bigger. this light never pulsed, never had any other color but white, seemed as low as a plane that had a propeller might fly, but i am sure this was no airplane. it was completely silent. not one noise from it at all. but what tripped me out was that the light was heading right for the spot where that meteor disappeared behind the treeline. i never moved during all of this, that is why i know the light went to the exact same spot as the meteor did. i came in very fast to find my camera and it wasnt where it was supposed to be, so i grabbed my cell phone. i couldnt get anything but black to show up and never tried to use the phone's video option.
content.summary: Decent size solid bright white light move across the sky, with no noise at all
